column1: Chenaran (Persian: چناران‎; also Romanized as Čenārān
column4: and Cenârân) is a city and capital of Chenaran County
column10: 179 families.Chenaran is a tourist city.  The city of Chenaran is located under the bridge called Shiny Bridge. It is mostly famous for its tourist objectives. Tourists come to take a look at the city over the famous Shiny Bridge. The city favors from a mountainous weather plus rich wildlife.
